casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jan Gray HINSHAW, Jr. No. 374P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-30":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
